# vyos_config (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Equivalent to "set system host-name vyos"
resource "vyos_config" "hostname" {
  key   = "system host-name"
  value = "vyos"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- **key** (String)
- **value** (String)

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
